forumNotes.author: far.in.out
forumNotes.content: Do you think it's a good idea to make one? Structured, up to date... Visible.

forumNotes.author: Brito
forumNotes.content: We had one many years ago, ended up out of date due to lack of feedback. What keeps working better are the forum pages where everyone can post and link to other pages. Not ideal, just something that keeps working.
